data.message: I would love the chance to meet ed sheeran, dream come true. I have been trying to get myself out there as i have been singing from a pretty young age and ed sheeran is my biggest idol for how he got to where he is today and inspires me also from that and also his music witch has also always hit home for me. Iv had a pretty rough life and could really do with this pick me up. On a fun interesting note i also am in a relationship with ed's look alike who is the most sweetest guy i have ever know and no matter what happens i know everything will be amazing with him in my life. I love you soo much Ty Jones xx
